channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge blocks deployment of National Guard to Oregon. And, the Supreme Court's new term
item.description: A judge issues an order to stop Trump's latest attempt to deploy the National Guard to Oregon. And, the Supreme Court opens a new term with justices t...

item.title: French Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu Resigns
item.description: Sébastien Lecornu’s departure ratcheted up pressure on President Emmanuel Macron to call snap parliamentary elections.

item.title: France's prime minister resigns after less than a month in office
item.description: Facing criticism from all sides, France's new prime minister Sébastien Lecornu resigned less than 24 hours after naming his government and after less ...

item.title: OpenAI Agrees to Use Computer Chips From AMD
item.description: Weeks after a $100 billion agreement to use computer chips from Nvidia, OpenAI has signed a similar deal with a rival chipmaker.

item.title: Paramount Buys Bari Weiss’s Free Press, Starting a New Era at CBS News
item.description: Bari Weiss, a founder of The Free Press, will become editor in chief of CBS News.

item.title: Gold Price Nears $4,000 an Ounce, a Sign of Turmoil and Unease
item.description: Approaching the milestone for the first time, the precious metal is on course for its best year since the 1970s, highlighting unease among investors.

item.title: How Bari Weiss of The Free Press Won the Top Job at CBS News
item.description: At The Free Press, she battled “wokeness” and buddied up with billionaires. Now she’s the editor in chief of CBS News.

item.title: The medicine Nobel Prize goes to 3 scientists for work on peripheral immune tolerance

item.title: How one country has become a top destination for hair transplants

item.title: A bold doctor sent her kids away and helped beat one of the world's deadliest viruses

item.title: Nobel Prizes 2025: What to Know
item.description: The awards are being announced this week.

item.description: Sébastien Lecornu’s departure ratcheted up pressure on President Emmanuel Macron to call snap parliamentary elections.
